articles.content:
Premier League clubs are backing proposed changes to the FA Cup and Carabao Cup tournaments, which could see sides in Europe opt out of the latter.
A shareholders’ meeting among Premier League clubs… [+2101 chars]

articles.title: Joseph Parker teases Joe Joyce before Manchester heavyweight fight as he says fans will be cheering him on - Sky Sports
articles.description: Joseph Parker has teased heavyweight rival Joe Joyce by warning the Briton some of the crowd at Manchester's AO Arena will be supporting him.
articles.content:
Joseph Parker has teased heavyweight rival Joe Joyce by warning the Briton some of the crowd at Manchester's AO Arena will be supporting him.
